mapper.select: SELECT id, username, real_name, avatar_url FROM user WHERE (username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CAST(id AS CHAR) = #{keyword}) AND id != #{currentUserId} AND role = 3

SELECT u.id, u.username, l.lng, l.lat FROM user u INNER JOIN location l ON u.id = l.user_id INNER JOIN staff_work sw ON u.id = sw.staff_id WHERE u.role = 2 AND u.service_status = 1 AND u.service_area_id = #{areaId} AND sw.service_id = #{serviceId} GROUP BY u.id
